app.title: Choco-Select
app.subtitle: Select your desired programs
app.description: Select your desired programs and generate the Chocolatey installation command.
app.footer: Choco Select - An Open Source Project

command.title: Chocolatey Installation Command
command.note: Note: Make sure Chocolatey is installed before running the command. Click 'Install Chocolatey' for instructions.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.responsible: Information according to ยง 5 TMG

section1.title: 1. Privacy at a Glance
section1.content: This website does not collect any personal data. No cookies are set and no tracking tools are used. The use of this website is completely anonymous.

section2.title: 2. Hosting
section2.content: This website is hosted on a private server. No access data is stored or analyzed.

section3.title: 3. External Links
section3.content: This website contains links to external websites (e.g. Chocolatey.org, GitHub). The respective operators are responsible for their content.
